name: Alliance Tournament IV: Pandemic Legion
description: Entering the Tournament world with a bang, <url=showinfo:16159//386292982>Pandemic Legion's</url> first ever team took great advantage of sensor dampener tactics to go on an impressive run to the finals, knocking out Tournament stalwarts <url=showinfo:16159//2031941852>Interstellar Alcohol Conglomerate</url>, ending <url=showinfo:16159//1439416485>The Star Fraction's</url> string of heroic victories, and defeating a <url=showinfo:16159//488282414>Terra Incognita.</url> team full of legendary PVP pilots. They were swiftly defeated in the finals by <url=showinfo:16159//1399057309>HUN Reloaded</url>, but this early silver medal would turn out to be a portent of future success.
group_name: Tournament Cards: Alliance Tournament All Stars
